ComicInfo.Title: Where Pass the Black Stars, There Also Passes... Death!
ComicInfo.Summary: Where Pass the Black Stars, There Also Passes... Death!: The Black Stars approach the Planet Rigel. The Rigellian upper classes flee in their spaceships. Thor and his crew arrive on Rigel just in time to evacuate the abandoned Rigellian mutant sub-classes. Rigel is destroyed. After a brief misunderstanding, the key characters meet up and gaze in awe at the encroaching menace.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:37:08. [Issue ID 26989]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
